metadata.name: Meta Painting 20
metadata.description:
The hidden energy slowly grows through the shapes and colors, leading us into another dimension...

Meta Paintings is a video art project on the Ethereum blockchain, inspired by real paintings.  1/1 edition pieces of video art with a unique animation style.

Only by purchasing an Nft, you will discover the real painting behind the animation. Soundtrack composed by the artist using different layers of distorted sound effects.
